thread.title: Joost van der Westhuizen dies, aged 45 - CNN.com
thread.title_full: Joost van der Westhuizen dies, aged 45 - CNN.com

title: Joost van der Westhuizen dies, aged 45 - CNN.com
text:
Springboks great Joost van der Westhuizen dies, aged 45 Updated 1335 GMT (2135 HKT) February 6, 2017 
Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. Joost van der Westhuizen was diagnosed with motor neurone disease in 2011. Story highlights 1995 World Cup winner passes away Had battled motor neuron disease since 2011 Made 89 appearances for Springboks (CNN) Former South Africa rugby great Joost van der Westhuizen has died aged 45 after losing his battle with motor neurone disease. Follow @cnnsport The 1995 Rugby World Cup winner's foundation confirmed his death Monday. "He passed away in his home surrounded by his loved ones. He will be sorely missed," the J9 Foundation said in a statement. Van der Westhuizen set up the charity after being diagnosed with motor neurone disease in 2011. It is with great sadness that we confirm the passing of Joost. He passed away in his home surrounded by his loved... https://t.co/WwyDGETq1A
